amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in contravention of the Secretary's ability to make grants to State and local government authorities to assist in financing of capital and small start projects, including acquisition of real property.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in contravention of section 5309 of title 49, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A031) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
